description.original: Improved table navigation, formatting, manipulation, and formulas
description.translation: Improved table navigation, formatting, manipulation, and formulas

dict.Notice(\"Advanced Tables: Cursor must be: Notice("Advanced Tables: Cursor must be in a table.")
dict.Notice(\"Advanced Tables: Next row also: Notice("Advanced Tables: Next row also bound to enter. Possibly producing double actions. See Advanced Tables settings.")
dict.Notice(\"Advanced Tables: Next cell also: Notice("Advanced Tables: Next cell also bound to tab. Possibly producing double actions. See Advanced Tables settings.")
dict.Notice(\"Advanced Tables: Previous cell: Notice("Advanced Tables: Previous cell also bound to shift+tab. Possibly producing double actions. See Advanced Tables settings.")
dict.name:\"Format all tables in this file\": name:"Format all tables in this file"
.setDesc('Requires restart of Obsidian. If enabled, when the cursor is in a table, enter advances to the next row. Disabling this can help avoid conflicting with tag or CJK autocompletion. If disabling, bind "Go to ..." in the Obsidian Hotkeys settings.')

.setDesc('Requires restart of Obsidian. If enabled, when the cursor is in a table, tab/shift+tab navigate between cells. Disabling this can help avoid conflicting with tag or CJK autocompletion. If disabling, bind "Go to ..." in the Obsidian Hotkeys settings.')
dict..setDesc(\"If enabled, table cells will: .setDesc("If enabled, table cells will have spaces added to match the width of the longest cell in the column.")
dict..setDesc(\"If enabled, a button which op: .setDesc("If enabled, a button which opens the table controls toolbar will be added to the Obsidian sidebar. The toolbar can also be opened with a Hotkey. Changes only take effect on reload.")
dict..appendText(\"If this plugin adds value: .appendText("If this plugin adds value for you and you would like to help support continued development, please use the buttons below:")
